text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun showed me<n>something remarkable at the
tryout<n>race the other day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I wander the academy grounds,<n>hoping to meet the spirited
racer one<n>more time.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hurry up, Yukipe! Don't you wanna<n>watch Gold City race
with your own<n>eyes? Let's get moving!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
H-hold up, Maya! On second thought,<n>I'm not sure if I
wanna go... I've<n>never been 'round so many people...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: C'moooon, you'll be fiiine! I'll be<n>with you the whole time!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait. I think I've seen you<n>before...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right! You're that trainer I met at<n>tryouts! Wow, funny
seeing you again!<n>Why are you here?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Huh? Me? Waaait, this is like...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Such a grown-up situation! Squee! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Buuut I'm kinda in a hurry right now,<n>so... as much as I
wanna talk,<n>y'know...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wait, I have an idea! Why don't you<n>come with us? That'd
be perfect!<n>Right, Yukipe?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huh? U-uhhh... Maya? What're you—

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You're coming with us! It's time for<n>takeoff!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Whaaa?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before either Yukino Bijin or I can<n>interject, Mayano Top
Gun grabs the<n>two of us by our wrists and drags us<n>along
with her.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are now approaching the<n>fourth and final
corner! Gold City<n>makes a beautiful turn from the<n>track's
outer side! And right behind<n>her is Tamamo Cross!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll show ya what true grit looks like!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: You're not going anywhere!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ohhh! Wooow! City's really<n>someth'n else!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I know, right?! City and Tamamo are<n>both sooo cool! It's
like they're<n>twinkling!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ohhh... So you can go zoooomthere? I never would've thought that!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Watching grown-up Umamusume<n>race is always suuuper
exciting!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun's eyes are<n>twinkling with joy, and her
gaze is<n>glued to the top Umamusume from<n>start to finish.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Finiiish! Tamamo Cross takes first<n>place! A close second,
Gold City<n>follows right behind her!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Yeah!Victory's mine!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Dang it, I messed up the timing on my<n>sprint...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
It's fine. This won't happen again.<n>Mark my words,
Tamamo. I'm going<n>to win next time.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh. Sounds like a challenge if<n>I've ever heard one! I'll
take ya up on<n>dat any time, any day, City!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Wow! That race was amaz'n!<n>Tamamo and City were both
so cool!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So she shouldn't have gone bamthere... It was too early! And Cityfigured that out... She really isamazing!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ughhh, watching twinkly grown-upsrace makes my heart keep going allbadump, badump... I wanna betwinkly too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yep! There's always something new<n>to learn from these big
races! So<n>watching them makes my heart go<n>badump!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
All those racers are so much more<n>experienced and grown
up! And<n>grown-ups are twinkly!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So like, I wanna be like that too! I<n>wanna be all twinkly and
running in<n>races that make people go badump!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Awww, maaan. I wanna run in the<n>Twinkle Series toooo!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
M-me too! G1 might be a ways away,<n>but I'll get there one
day! I hafta!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
All right! Let's get ourselves back to<n>the academy and start
train'n!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Blegh, training?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I don't wanna! I'm not gonna!<n>Training sucks!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna explore the racetrack! See<n>ya!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wait, Maya! Geez, she's already<n>gone...
choice_data_list: Is she not very good at training?
Is she not very good at training?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
No way! There's noth'n Maya can't<n>do! Once she puts her
mind to<n>someth'n, you can't stop her. She's<n>amaz'n like
that.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Like when she got used to runn'n on<n>the dirt tracks real
quick! And I've<n>never seen her even break a sweat<n>dur'n
our dance lessons!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
She's even good at study'n!<n>Anyway, if she says "I got it,"
then<n>she's really got it!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh, Maya says it heaps of times.<n>For everyth'n,
actually! She gets it all!<n>It's amazing, really...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to Yukino Bijin, I feel like I<n>have a slightly better
understanding of<n>Mayano Top Gun and her abilities.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She has a prodigious ability to "get<n>it"...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That is, her astounding intuition that<n>always leads her down
the right path.<n>She's a bona fide genius!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But for some reason, she has no<n>interest whatsoev'r in
training... Ever<n>since our first session, she hasn't<n>shown
up at all...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... And 'cause of that, she isn't<n>allowed to run in any
races—not even<n>scrimm'ges!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I get that races are where you're<n>s'pposed to show the
fruits of your<n>training, but... I dunno... I still feel sorry<n>for
Maya. The poor thing...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't stop thinking about Mayano<n>Top Gun. She wants to
race more than<n>anything, yet...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Is there anything I can do for her?
